page.title: 16OCCUPATIONS
page.content: Most people work in Elgin but some work at Miltonduff Distillery and some at home.The different occupations include cooks,brewers,workers in education,a doctor and of course housewives. Most people travel to work by car although some local people cycle or walk. A questionaire found that people in general enjoy their work and living in the country does not interfere with their jobs. Some people keep the same job for a long time.For example Forestry workers tend either to leave after a short time or to stay for most of their working lives.Other people have had up to eight different jobs,although most find their work rewarding.
